rules.description: CTRL+A,E,H to Home,End,Delete to Microsoft Office for Dvorak
バッククオートとチルダを割り当てる。
Change Option + J/K/L/I to Arrow Keys
Remap keys to use Dvorak keyboard layout
Change spacebar to left_shift if pressed with other keys (Post spacebar when pressed alone)
CTRL+A,E to Home,End for Microsoft Office
Change spacebar to left_shift if pressed with other keys (Post spacebar when pressed alone)
CTRL+A,E,H to Home,End,Delete to Microsoft Office for Dvorak
バッククオートとチルダを割り当てる。
Change Option + J/K/L/I to Arrow Keys

Change spacebar to left_shift if pressed with other keys (Post spacebar when pressed alone)
